name: World Colliding
description:
Controls
  • [WASD] - Move
  • [Mouse Movement] Look
  • [Left Mouse] Interact
  • [Right Mouse] Switch Themes
Game

You find yourself in stuck in a dimension between dimensions. You gain the ability to switch streams of reality. Will you be able to use this ability to find your way through overlapping temples? Who knows what you will find.

Future

Know Bugs

Unfortunately the shader that handles the changing of themes is not working correctly in this build. I am working on a fix and will add a patch after the Jam voting is done!
